2 slices White Bread
1 tspn mayo
1 tspn mustard
1/4 cup lettuce
sliced turkey
1 tomato
Ingredients First, lay two slices of white bread flat. if you wish, toast to preference using a toaster. Second, spread the mayonnaise on one slice of bread, and then the mustard. this will be your bottom slice. Third, slice your tomato with the chefs knife. once done, place the lettuce over the mayo and mustard, followed by the freshly sliced tomato. lastly, layer slices of prepackaged turkery over the rest of your ingredients. top it off with the other slice of bread and serve.
